languages.text: "Ты могла бы договориться со мной, обсудить свои недовольства, и мы бы нашли путь. Но ты выбрала плести интриги за моей спиной. Казнить".
"You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."
languages.original_text: "Ты могла бы договориться со мной, обсудить свои недовольства, и мы бы нашли путь. Но ты выбрала плести интриги за моей спиной. Казнить".

traits.locale_text: "You could have negotiated with me, brought up your dissatisfaction, and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."
"You could have negotiated with me, brought up your dissatisfaction, and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."
"You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."
"You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."
"You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."
"You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."

languages.text: "Ihr hättet mit mir verhandeln und Eurer Unzufriedenheit Ausdruck verleihen können ... wir hätten gewiss einen Weg gefunden. Stattdessen habt Ihr hinter meinem Rücken intrigiert. Exekutiert sie."
languages.original_text: "You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hättet mit mir verhandeln und Eurer Unzufriedenheit Ausdruck verleihen können ... wir hätten gewiss einen Weg gefunden. Stattdessen habt Ihr hinter meinem Rücken intrigiert. Exekutiert sie."

languages.text: « Vous auriez pu négocier avec moi. Si vous m'aviez fait part de votre insatisfaction, nous aurions trouvé une solution. Au lieu de cela, vous avez préféré comploter dans mon dos. Exécutez-la. »
languages.original_text: "You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."

traits.locale_text: « Vous auriez pu négocier avec moi. Si vous m'aviez fait part de votre insatisfaction, nous aurions trouvé une solution. Au lieu de cela, vous avez préféré comploter dans mon dos. Exécutez-la. »

languages.text: “你本可以和我谈判，提出你的不满，我们也本可以找到办法解决问题。可实际上呢？你在我背后搞阴谋诡计。把她处决。”
languages.original_text: "You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."

traits.locale_text: “你本可以和我谈判，提出你的不满，我们也本可以找到办法解决问题。可实际上呢？你在我背后搞阴谋诡计。把她处决。”

languages.text: «Podría haber negociado conmigo, expresado su falta de satisfacción. Habríamos encontrado una solución. En vez de eso, eligió conspirar contra mí. Ejecútenla».
languages.original_text: "You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."

traits.locale_text: «Podría haber negociado conmigo, expresado su falta de satisfacción. Habríamos encontrado una solución. En vez de eso, eligió conspirar contra mí. Ejecútenla».

languages.text: 「君は{mf|俺|私}と交渉し、不満をぶつけることもできたはずだ。そうすれば解決の道はあった。だが、裏で陰謀を企てる道を選んだな。処刑しろ」
languages.original_text: "You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."

traits.locale_text: 「君は{mf|俺|私}と交渉し、不満をぶつけることもできたはずだ。そうすれば解決の道はあった。だが、裏で陰謀を企てる道を選んだな。処刑しろ」

languages.text: "Benimle müzakere edip hoşnutsuzluğunu dile getirebilirdin. Elbet bir orta yol bulurduk. Lakin sen, her şeye rağmen arkamdan iş çevirmeyi tercih ettin. İnfaz edin."
languages.original_text: "You could have negotiated with me — voiced your dissatisfaction — and we would have found a way. Instead, you chose to plot behind my back. Execute her."

traits.locale_text: "Benimle müzakere edip hoşnutsuzluğunu dile getirebilirdin. Elbet bir orta yol bulurduk. Lakin sen her şeye rağmen arkamdan iş çevirmeyi tercih ettin. İnfaz edin."
